text: Longinus (; ) was a Byzantine Monophysite missionary and the first ordained Christian bishop in Nubia. The main sources for his life are his contemporary and fellow Monophysite, , who knew him; the 9th-century historian ; and the 15th-century Muslim historian . John includes a letter written by Longinus in his chronicle. ==Notes== ==Sources== * * * * * * ==Further reading== * * Category:6th-century Byzantine bishops Category:6th-century Egyptian people Category:Oriental Orthodox missionaries Category:Christian missionaries in Africa Category:History of Nubia Category:Roman-era Alexandrians
title: Longinus (missionary)
